First off, I'm gonna go ahead and say that this game is very good. One of the best first person shooters out there. It can be glitchy at times but other than that, no problem. Another thing, there are a decent amount of cheaters in the game but ever since I upgraded to prime, I haven't seen a single one. So I'd rate the game a good 4.3/5. I'm putting a 4.3 solely based on the cheaters. I play on a Mac Computer, which isn't the best thing to game on, but it works. If they upgraded their Anti-cheat then I'd give this a 5/5.
